verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> was Jesus <S%G4260><s%> led up <S%G1564><s%> of the <S%G1492><s%> Spirit <S%G1417><s%> into <S%G243><s%> the <S%G80><s%> wilderness <S%G2385><s%> to be tempted of <S%G2199><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> devil <S%G2491><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had fasted <S%G3522><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> nights <S%G3571><s%>, he <S%G3983><s%> afterward <S%G5305><s%> hungered <S%G3983><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the tempter <S%G3985><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, command <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%>, Man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G2198><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> that proceedeth <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G1223><s%> of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> taketh <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3880><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he set <S%G2476><s%> him <S%G846><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple <S%G2411><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, cast <S%G906><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> down <S%G2736><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G3754><s%>, He shall give <S%G1781><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, On <S%G1909><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> they shall bear <S%G142><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> up <S%G142><s%>, lest haply <S%G3379><s%> thou dash <S%G4350><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Again <S%G3825><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G1598><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> make trial <S%G1598><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%>, the devil <S%G1228><s%> taketh <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> an <S%G3880><s%> exceeding <S%G3029><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> showeth <S%G1166><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> will I give <S%G1325><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt fall down <S%G4098><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> saith Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Get <S%G3004><s%> thee <S%G3004><s%> hence <S%G4567><s%>, Satan: for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Thou shalt worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G846><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> shalt thou serve <S%G3000><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> leaveth <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, angels <S%G32><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> up <S%G402><s%>, he withdrew into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> leaving <S%G2641><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%> and dwelt <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is by the sea <S%G3864><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Naphtali <S%G3508><s%>:
that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

The land <S%G1093><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Naphtali <S%G3508><s%>, Toward <S%G3598><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%>, Galilee <S%G1056><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1093><s%>,

the people <S%G2992><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the region <S%G5561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, to them did light <S%G5457><s%> spring up <S%G393><s%>.

From <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> began <S%G756><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%>, Repent <S%G3340><s%> ye <S%G1063><s%>; for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, he <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%> who is called <S%G3004><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Come <S%G1205><s%> ye <S%G3694><s%> after me <S%G3450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G3694><s%> will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G863><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the nets <S%G1350><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> going on <S%G4260><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, mending <S%G2675><s%> their <S%G846><s%> nets <S%G1350><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they straightway <S%G2112><s%> left <S%G863><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, and followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went about <S%G4013><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, teaching <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> healing <S%G2323><s%> all manner of <S%G3956><s%> disease <S%G3119><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all manner of <S%G3956><s%> sickness <S%G3554><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the report <S%G189><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> went <S%G565><s%> forth <S%G1519><s%> into all <S%G3956><s%> Syria <S%G4947><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G2192><s%> were sick <S%G2560><s%>, holden <S%G4912><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torments <S%G931><s%>, possessed with demons <S%G1139><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> epileptic <S%G4583><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> palsied <S%G3885><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> great multitudes <S%G4183><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Decapolis <S%G1179><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Judaea and <S%G2532><s%> from beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%>.
